title: Which country has easiest education system in world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably none; but I must say, when I was growing up in Jamaica, I had a very easy childhood education. I went to school on average 3–4 days per week until I was about 11 years old. We didn’t have major testing before high school (no state tests) except for high school entrance. And in high school we had major testing twice. Once to graduate, and another time for our advanced studies for graduates who wanted to have a curriculum segueing to university.
